citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on06-JUL-18 at 9:40 AM.
APHIS inspector arrived at the facility on Friday, July 6, at approximately 9:40 AM. A facility representative informed
the inspector that the individuals needed to accompany her on the inspection and provide facility documentation
were not present and would not be available that morning.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on06-JUL-18 at 9:40 AM.
APHIS inspector arrived at the facility on Friday, July 6, at approximately 9:40 AM. A facility representative informed
the inspector that the individuals needed to accompany her on the inspection and provide facility documentation
were not present and would not be available that morning.
